title: Shiftless
description: Claire always thought she was a freak, but never could imagine how much of a freak she really was, which is saying a lot for a non-shape-shifting shape-shifter. If the newest revelation to her life was not enough enter the dashingly handsome Crown Prince, blowing into her life like a force of nature. Will Claire be able to get over her own self-consciousness to accept him or her destiny? (Mature Young Adult and not a Stand alone)
author: Sarah Kay Carter
